CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1961, pg. 1, reads: "New Safety Director - James J. Dillion, formerly with the FBI, and the staffs of the United States Attorney and Allegheny County District Attorney, is sworn in as Pittsburgh Safety Director by Mayor Barr as Councilman Pat Fagan observes. Dillon promised at Monday's ceremony to conduct his office for the "welfare of all the people." - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: James Dillon being sworn in as Safety Director by Mayor Joseph Barr, withPatrick Fagan looking on, in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers
